review: My daughter was diagnosed with ITP idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura and is undergoing treatment with Dr Nimish Kulkarni  Dr Nimish is a doctor with Human heart and  caring doctor with sympathetic approach towards the patient and their relatives. He is very friendly and always available. His way of explaining the disease and the treatment is very good.,gives enough time for our complaints. He is my daughter's favourite doctor.
